QuestData.Title: Twilight Riot
QuestData.Description: I thank you for freeing me. Let us take advantage of the distraction you've created and get out of here.$B$BWe must hurry before the cultists catch on.$B$BMeet me again when we've left this place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Jarod Shadowsong at the Gates of Sothann in Hyjal.
